lender.name: M&M
lender.loan_because:
It's an enabler of opportunities and does not create a dependence on charity.
Let's be honest, the act of "loaning" for a social cause is it's own benefit. In other words, I feel better about myself just by participating, and believing that I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Help companies determine if their cell phone causes TV or radio problems.

lender.name: Kerrien
lender.loan_because: Poverty is everyone's problem. It cuts across any line you can name: age, race, social, geographic or religious. Whether you are black or white; rich, middle-class or poor, we are ALL touched by poverty.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: It is only a small loan, but I like the idea of being able to help someone less fortunate than myself in a most constructive way.
lender.occupational_info: Working with numbers and other people has always been a very rewarding My job is Interesting, varied and most certainly a challenge.

lender.name: EVE
lender.loan_because: It's fast, easy, and feels good to be making a real difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home to care for our four children, who home school. My husband has a chimney cleaning/lining business.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I am happy when I can help

lender.name: Friends in Fredonia
lender.loan_because: We believe it is one of the best things we can do.
lender.occupational_info: We are trying to add the little bit we can to try to reach a tipping point ...

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I want to empower individuals to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching English at Osaka Christian College in Osaka, Japan for one year.

lender.name: Kimi
lender.loan_because: I know that building a strong economy is one of the best long-term way to change lives. And I believe that educated locals can make better choices than most foreigners, so the money and the power goes to you.
lender.occupational_info: I study psychology.

lender.name: Beit Ariella
lender.loan_because: Jewish sages teach that the greatest form of tzedakah (charity) is making a loan to help a person start their own business. Kiva lets me do that.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers on a daily basis.

lender.name: Marit Bromark
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help change the world.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because:
An old man walking along the beach at dawn sees a young man picking up a starfish and throwing them out to sea.
"Why are you doing that?" The old man inquired. The young man explained that the starfish had been stranded on the beach by the receding tide and they'd soon die in the daytime sun.
"But the beach goes on for miles," the old man said. "And there's so many! How can your effort make any difference?"
The young man looked at the starfish in his hand and without hesitating threw it to safety in the sea.
He looked up at the old man, smiled and said, "It will make a difference to that one."

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: i can!
lender.occupational_info: i help people operate stores.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I beleive these people deserve a chance to get out of poverty which is artificially created by few greedy people or nations.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: its a great way to have a personal connection to people the world over.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make better laws for communities in the coalfields of the Appalachian mountains.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: We have too much and it should be shared.
lender.occupational_info: Software.

lender.name: Daryn and Lily
lender.loan_because: the people I loan to get more bang for the buck than I do
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are both consultants in the IT Industry.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I feel loaning money through Kiva is a way I can help someone who is trying to improve the quality of life for themselves and their family but needs a little assistance. I've been blessed in so many ways in my life and I feel it's the right thing to do to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I'm not working at a "paying" job at this time, so I have the privilige of volunteering at several local agencies who help make a difference in the lives of those less fortunate.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help those less fortunate. I'm happy that I'm able to do this and thankful to kiva for enabling these loans to be made.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time in a health food store advising customers on supplements and foods.

lender.name: Josh and Shey
lender.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.

lender.name: Vadim
lender.loan_because: I believe in a hand up not a hand out, a great idea someone once had. I believe the only way to improve this world and enrich everyones life is by bringing up economy, and giving a purpose and direction to peoples lives. And with my limited experience, capabilities, knowledge and resources, this is the best outlet for my beliefs.
lender.occupational_info: Aside from being a full time student, I also consult and sell wireless communication products and services.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I wanted world peace for my birthday.

lender.name: SALIOU
lender.loan_because: I loan some money so that I can revalorize my trade and put a some money for my studyies, because it is me who pays my studyies with my small trade and the studyies of my little brother. I am a student in physic, but I want to mak computer ingineering, but it is necessary to have some money. It is for that after my courses, I do a little job, and a little trade to meet my needs and pay my study fees.
lender.occupational_info: At the beginning I worked like a receptionist, after a coffee manager, to start. After I took my economis to buy goods, to eat, and cigarettes, and the various ones which I resells after the courses. It is like that my trade is going on.

lender.name: TreeGoddess
lender.loan_because: Providing for your family is priceless. Being able to lending a small amount of money to help someone achieve this makes me feel like I'm helping to make the world a better place for all of our children.

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: I CAN AND THERE IS A NEED WHEN I WAS IN NEED PEOPLE WHO COULD, DID AND NOW THANKS TO THEM I CAN SO THIS IS MY THANKS TO THEM TO CARRY ON WHAT THEY STARTED WITH ME
lender.occupational_info: I AM A UNIT OPERATOR IN A REFINERY MAKING PETRO PRODUCTS I GIVE THE REPAID FUNDS TO THE NEXT LOAN SO THAT THE PEOPLE WHO REPAY ARE THE ONES LOANING INSTEAD OF ME IT IS THEY WHO KEEP THE WORLD TURNING empowered by the fact that repaying their loans make them the lender and no longer the borrower,a force set in motion that changes lives.!!!!!!YES!!!!!!

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: There is no need for poverty on this abundent planet. I started a business from nothing and it is now very successfull and I want to share that and hope the recipients will in turn help others. It's a small world after all!
lender.occupational_info: I am a fashion designer and clothing manufactorer and retailer.

lender.name: Marti
lender.loan_because: I can make more of a difference with several loans rather than one donation. It is so rewarding and fullfilling, why wouldn't you want to help someone?

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: From each according to his ability, to each according to his need.
lender.occupational_info: I help wire homes and businesses to use the energy from the sun to provide their electricity.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Who doesn't need a helping hand?
lender.occupational_info: Creating Shelter - one home at a time

lender.name: Rick & Laura Rabner
lender.loan_because: We like knowing that we can have an impact, however small.
lender.occupational_info: Rick is an attorney and Laura is a marketing and tourism manager with a real estate company specializing in retail.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I have been given way more than I need.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I hope my small loans help make a difference for someone.
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses.

lender.name: Dolores
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who need help.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving back
lender.occupational_info: I produce two daily international newscasts .

lender.name: art
lender.loan_because: i believe that hard working people should be helped.

lender.name: Chris D.
lender.loan_because: I believe that this model is an inspiring and sustainable way to alleviate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work in energy finance, particularly lending to renewable energy projects.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: My life has been so blessed and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise Student Teachers who are in the process of earning their Mathematics teaching credentials.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: so many other people have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I help people record information about their own native languages and I teach students how to communicate with people from other cultures.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I designed, oversaw construction, inspected and operated traffic signalized intersections and systems in Southwestern Pennsylvania around Pittsburgh.

lender.name: Dan , Ann & Amanda
lender.loan_because: Dan; I started and built my business because someone trusted me and made me a loan. Ann; I want to help someone with a dream~ Amanda; Our daughter wants to help people in need for their businesses
lender.occupational_info: I got my first home loan 25 years ago. I lived in that home while I fixed it up and sold it for a profit. I fell in love with Real Estate and went full time 20 years ago. I fix and sell homes, have rentals and loan cash to home owners. I love my work and the great abundance it has provided.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to reach their goals. Sometimes it takes just a little help to realize a dream.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Funding a recipient's aspirations can have a profound and lasting effect.

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: My students and I held a car wash to raise money for KIVA because we wanted to do something to help others in need. We donated $100 to four business we wanted to support.
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school teacher at a small school in Jackson, Wyoming.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: if you give a man a fish, he will eat for a day; if you teach a man to fish, he will eat for life. Cheesy, cliche, but very, very true.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that all of the money in a company is tracked and recorded accurately. Basically, I do a lot of math for a living.

lender.name: Tristan PM
lender.loan_because: loans change lives

lender.name: Kathy, Jeff, Jake, Molly
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life even if it's just a little bit at a time. If I need help, I hope someone will have compassion for me so I want to do the same.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I may be able to help someone build a better life for themselves and their family.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have several people in my life to lend me a hand when I needed help. I hope that I can do the same for someone.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can help others, and I get the money back to give to someone else? Why the heck wouldn't you do this?
lender.occupational_info: I compose music for movies and TV shows.

lender.name: Raouf & Mahasti
lender.loan_because: we are originally from Iran and now Canadian Citizens. We wouldn't be in this country if this chance had not been given to us by nice Canadian people. We understand that if we were in Iran we could not be any help to others since we could not make enough money ( comparing to a professional in Canada)! So by doing this, hope to be a little bit useful for others. If anybody just can put aside 1% of his/her salary each month, it is going to be something for people in developing countries!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I've been looking for a direct way of help people in other parts of the world and Kiva seems to be just what I'm looking for. Love seeing a picture and knowing more about the people who I lend money too.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from full time work. I did computer programming for over 30 years.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: The stories of both the borrowers and the lenders are truly inspiring, and the possibilities for this world are truly incredible.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: I want to see as many as possible lifted out of poverty, and the only way to do that is through economic opportunity and freedom, not gifts
lender.occupational_info: I support trading systems in global bank

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing way to assist people to become self sufficient.

lender.name: Roz
lender.occupation: Mom of 3, Wife of 1 & RT to many in need
lender.loan_because: Even though we are not rich and my husband works 2 labor intensive jobs and I spend many hours every week at my job, my family still has more than others. I am blessed and grateful. As I know those who need help are. So why not help even if it is something small. Every small act of kindness ends up something bigger to that someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who have trouble breathing or live with respiratory illnesses. I work in emergency situations or just with every day medications. I concentrate on the lungs (pulmonary system) and even help those who get really sick and need to be put on a machine to breath till they get better.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: any little bit helps.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses grow by letting others know more about what they do.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I was once at a hard place with small chidren to raise. I hope to help others smile because they too can do it! good luck
lender.occupational_info: I give people new hair styles. It makes people feel good to look good. It also helps to get and keep jobs in the US

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I like knowing exactly where my money is going; because it's direct, no middle-man; and because I think helping people help themselves is ultimately a better solution than just giving money away

lender.name: Mr. Schipper's Class
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to introduce world geography and social justice to a high school world history class! As a privileged Catholic school, "bursting our bubble" is not the easiest experience. Kiva provides a wonderful teaching tool!

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I know these people stuggle every single day and I can not imagine the kind of poverty they live with. It makes me happy that my loan will help them and uplift them and in turn I am repaid with their happiness.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I investigate structural failures and construction accidents to determine cause.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: its the most amazing tool to directly help individuals
lender.occupational_info: as a small local business, we design, fabricate, sew and upholster custom furnishings for peoples homes and businesses

lender.name: Kerri
lender.loan_because: After seeing this organization on TV, I felt that I was able to help even if it is in such a small manner...someone who is really trying to help themselves. I wish all of them the best of luck and good furtune!!
lender.occupational_info: My job...well let's see. Most of my day is spent in my office, collecting rents from tenants here in Michigan.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: My mother and I went through great financial difficulties after my parents divorced when I was in high school, so I know how it feels to have to rely on the generosity of other people to get you through day by day. Today I attend college and have all of my financial needs met through scholarships, grants, and federal loans so I have extra money that I can loan out now.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Lending money to enterprising people makes me feel blessed. I find that I appreciate the things I have and mourn less of the losses in my life when I am consciously thankful. I love seing those 100% repaid notices, because I know how awesome it feels to finish payments on something.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: There are so many reasons! It definitely makes me feel great. I love that I am able to make a difference across the world. Also, I think it makes a bigger impact than outright donations. My first loan was a few years ago, and reloaning that same sum of money has contributed to several successful businesses! Amazing.

lender.name: Lisa and Bill
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful way to connect with people all across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I keep all the computers and other technology working in a middle school (students age 12-14) in Saint Paul, MN

lender.name: Indy Ladies Who Launch
lender.loan_because: Many people have been wonderful in supporting me in becoming an entrepreneur, and I want to help other women do the same in areas of the world where there are less opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Supporting individuals in achieving a more dynamic and fulfilling life through workshops and one-on-one coaching.

lender.name: Reine
lender.loan_because: I was raised by a single mother for most of my life who taught me to never give up no matter what the circumstances. Now it is time to pay it forward whenever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major company which provides energy for the Northwest Region of the U.S.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I believe that to whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I help to successfully resettle refugees from war torn countries across the globe to their challenging new life in the US.

lender.name: DHJ
lender.loan_because: Individual economic independence will advance the cause of freedom more than any government or institution
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage their personal investments and finances.

lender.name: The Robertson Family
lender.loan_because: We are thrilled and humbled to be able to do this for other businesses. We own 2 businesses and know the costs of doing business for ourselves. We want to help others attain their goals for their families, and see great success in their business. Great reward is deserved for those who work so hard to make their lives better. Those in need through Kiva deserve help in making their lives better - they are working hard!
lender.occupational_info: We offer home and commercial mortgage loans for properties located in most of the states in the United States! We offer competitive rates and unbeatable service with access to hundreds of loan programs to fit any need or goal.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: There's a saying that goes "give a man a fish and he can eat for a day; give a man a fishing pole and he can eat for years." Loans seem like a respectful way to help disadvantaged people improve their communities
lender.occupational_info: I'm a scientist. My research is focused on preventing cancer.

lender.name: Eura
lender.loan_because:
The quality of mercy is not strain'd, It droppeth as the gentle rain from heaven Upon the place beneath. It is twice blest: It blesseth him that gives and him that takes.
William Shakespeare, "The Merchant of Venice",

lender.name: Alex
lender.occupational_info: I help companys provide medical insurance to their retireed employees

lender.name: Mary Jane
lender.loan_because: Its a wonderful way to help people become self-sufficient in businesses/interests they operate/own.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, especially women, support their families and raise their communities out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I'm working to finish my education. I hope to I teach college students about art from all civilizations when I graduate.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: Christ has blessed me with the ability to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently learning visual design for a possible future career in the media industry.

lender.name: dave kilmartin
lender.loan_because: It is a very real way to enable others to empower themselves
lender.occupational_info: work with students to enable them to realise their career potential

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because:
"I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy."
-Rabindranath Tagore

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: It is a practical way to help people accomplish their dreams and goals in life.
lender.occupational_info: My personal goal is to assist youth in both their formal and informal learning in order to empower them so that they can live out their God given purposes.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I can and I am a disciple who is a lender not a borrower.
lender.occupational_info: Author

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I have started my own business and want to help other people to build theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I design and write advertisements for TV, Posters, Radio and Internet promoting many different types of products and services.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. To me, that's obvious. Even poor folks like me can help fellow humans so far away to create positive change in their lives and communities..
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds from wealthy private foundations, the government and individual rich people to support the training, performance and community outreach work of a senior and intergenerational theatre company in Oakland, California.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Every business deserves a chance

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: it's needed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently in school, on the course towards becoming a nurse.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and blessed in my life and I would like to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former high school Spanish teacher and I am currently a graduate student. I work part time as an undergraduate academic advisor while I am in school.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: 25 dollars is nothing to me but everything to someone else.

lender.name: Humboldt Geographic Society
lender.loan_because: Our goal is to connect students and their dollars at Humboldt State University with other human beings at a grass roots level to create a more just global community.
lender.occupational_info: We channel money from our food sales table into a wide range of Earth-changing non-government organizations.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: its really the least that I can do. And its fun!!
lender.occupational_info: I deliver babies.

lender.name: Shami
lender.loan_because: I want to empower struggling hardworking people who have no where else to turn.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: the gift is in the giving.
lender.occupational_info: Education encourages growth, and growth encourages understanding. And understanding will promote peace. Be a friend and help someone.

lender.name: Alec & Katie
lender.loan_because: People need these loans to enrich their lives, and we want to follow God's desire to help them.
lender.occupational_info: We are creative people and have been blessed with good opportunities for creative, fulfilling work. Whether making movies, web sites, or planning great events, we want to share our vision across the world for those in need.

lender.name: Brown Paper Treats
lender.loan_because: microfinance loans are a productive way to sew into developing communities and affect working poor around the world. Kiva provides an active way to give and contribute to change in individuals and communitites.
lender.occupational_info: Brown Paper Treats creates unique baked items for parties and events. As people purchase our items to celebrate special life moments, we want them to be a part of our effort to give back to those in need.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Helping people makes the world a better place.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes giving back easy!

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I have enough money to live on and others need it a lot more than I do. I like to be able to fund worthy causes and help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired from the federal government and do volunteer work in an emergency room at a local hospital, deliver meals on wheels, and transport cancer patients for their treatments.

lender.name: Karen Landis
lender.loan_because: I believe people are worth taking a chance on.
lender.occupational_info: During the day, I help design web sites. At night, I make jewelry.

lender.name: diana
lender.loan_because: I care to share and wish I could do more
lender.occupational_info: Busy

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.

lender.name: Kcowmoo
lender.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur and I know how hard it is to start a buisness.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: First and foremost, because it is the right thing to do. Secondly, our country has had a very fortunate economy for the past one hundred years. Over the next forty years, the economies of India and China are projected to match ours. Given another ten to twenty years, Brazil and Russia may as well. Why not help other economies have the same level of success? Everyone deserves it, we all work the same hard day. I will do what I can to help small businesses start and grow, and do my part to bring their countries and regions along with them. We ALL deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people reach their long term financial goals. My goal is to protect what they have already earned and hopefully help them do more than they could do with just a paycheck.

lender.name: Keli
lender.loan_because: The answer to other people's prayers can be found in our own actions.
lender.occupational_info: I am a music teacher.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It's a way for me to share what God has abundantly shared with me.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.occupation: sometimes work, sometimes teach, sometimes travel

lender.name: Cristian Petrini
lender.loan_because:
"Sometimes even to live is an act of courage."
"The best way to predict the future is to create it."
"Be the change you wish to see in the world."
lender.occupational_info: Living life...

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I was moved when I heard about Kiva. I think this makes me feel like I'm doing something to help change our world. I think it also makes me feel like I'm a part of the "big picture" outside my immediate community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults who have Mental Retardation. I help them improve the way they function in society so they can be more integrated in their communities with less stigma.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve their existence!

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I like to think that this can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Filling prescriptions and dealing with insurance companies that don't want to cover prescriptions.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I was a peace corps volunteer that started a small village savings bank in Tene, Mali (West Africa). I've seen the impact first hand.

lender.name: Dagan
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life, and this feels like a good way to give back and contribute to a positive change in the world.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: hard working people across the world deserve access to resources to help improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I publish informational websites

lender.name: BJ and Charity
lender.loan_because: It feels like we're making a difference.

lender.name: Kiersten
lender.loan_because: It feels good! ...and because I can...

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: It is each and every person's responsibility to help change the world

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I feel that micro-loans help give a person the economic means to become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I recently returned from teaching science in Guyana. Currently, I'm studying Public Interest Law and Policy.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling I get when I have helped someone.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: There's no greater service one can do for mankind than to help them achieve their desires/goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am an opportunist. (within reason)

lender.name: BOB
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do

lender.name: Dr. Mary
lender.loan_because: It's another way for me to help someone who needs it- Some loans are made in places I've traveled to or in honor of others who Love certain countries!!!
lender.occupational_info: I touch others to help their bodies to heal and turn on the Power God gave them!!!

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I could start my small business because of a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people how to play a sport called squash.

lender.name: Vinay
lender.loan_because: Why shoud'nt I ?
lender.occupational_info: I am engineer working in the energy business, building and designing gas and power plants.

lender.name: Leigh Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am Controller by trade and a volunteer by choice. I volunteer at the Food Bank, Humane Society, Education Foundation and Community Foundation. I raise puppies for Canine Companions for Independence.

lender.name: In Memoriam Greg Magie
lender.occupational_info: Greg was a young man who loved to work with his hands. He designed a hillside waterfall in San Marcos, California.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can, and it makes so much sense. I like that it helps people create a living on their own terms, given their own talents, wisdom, background, and local resources.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I care about helping people. God has blessed me with resources and I like to make them available to others who would appreciate my help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician as well as a nurse. Right now, I am not working as a nurse but I work part time accompanying choral groups and playing the cello.

lender.name: DIANE
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for my own good fortune and want to pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large nursing home. We care for the elderly and the sick that are no longer able to stay at home.

lender.name: Saint Bonaventure High
lender.loan_because: To help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Caring high school students.

lender.name: Leticia
lender.loan_because: I believe people deserve the chance to grow and provide income for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I help organize data and information using a computer.

lender.name: Khandaker
lender.loan_because: I am bestowed with more then I deserve by Allah. I would like to loan so that I can fulfill my duty to mankind. If He wanted I could be and still can be on the other end, needing a loan.
lender.occupational_info: I am working to find the casue of diseases like asthma in children and multiple sclerosis. I am an epideiologist.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: Prison Guard

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Unlike other giving opportunities, loans leverage the creativity and skills of people in places of need. It creates businesses which may eventually employ others. Loaning direct helps me feel part of an individual's life - there is an emotional connection. Finally, this system bypasses most of the political barriers to making a real difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses be more effective at selling their product or service by using the internet to build relationships with customers.

lender.name: Darcy
lender.loan_because: Mum & Dad say I am very lucky and we have to think of others.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school & gym & swimming, but I love the nintendo DS best of all.

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: I have a very good life, and I'm looking for a way to give back.

lender.name: Rainer
lender.loan_because: it is time to do something, what governments, bank and other decisive members of the community cannot do anymore

lender.name: Sammie & JP
lender.loan_because:
Both my wife (Sammie) and I (JP) are entrepreneurs and we know the power of entrepreneurship... we want to give back to other entrepreneurs who need cash.
We were fortunate to have each other for cash when we started our businesses.
Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime
lender.occupational_info: I (JP) help businesses make money on the internet.

lender.name: Jorge & Monica
lender.loan_because: Coming from Cuba where there is a lot of need, we feel that we should help others to succeed. We enjoy helping others to reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Jorge provides IT consulting to Pharmaceutical companies. Monica teaches English as a second language to Kindergarten through 5th grade. Both own and operate a Kitchen Exhaust Cleaning company.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it feels only right.
lender.occupational_info: Sales

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: A few years ago, my 5th graders and I decided to do our part to help the fight against global poverty. Our loan money was donated by those students. I keep lending it out to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 4th and 5th graders in Virginia(USA).

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: ...while it is important to give a person a fish, it is even more important that they are able to fish for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who has the great privilege of learning from all of my students. I teach Social Studies and enjoy sharing important information about our "global village" with the kids. I also use my KIVA.org experiences when teaching Economics--it is a wonderful learning tool!

lender.name: Shannon
lender.occupational_info: I assist people with disabilities in performing daily activities

lender.name: omkar
lender.loan_because: Feed a person, he/she will be hungry next day. Help the person earn his feeding, he will never be hungry
lender.occupational_info: use the power of Information technology in doing business in an effective and efficient way

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to give a boost to those who are less fortunate than me and trying to improve their lives
lender.occupational_info: CFO of hedge fund

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to share something with people accross the globe. I love that I can connect in this small way and make a difference to an individual
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse taking care of children with cancer and blood diseases. Many of our patients survive and go on to live happy healthy lives so my work is full of joy and beauty.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: Generosity feeds the soul. If only $25 can change someones life,I can skip going out to dinner with friends. I am also a single mom to a young son. I want him to understand how important it is to be good to others. You can't enjoy it unless you give it away! It is so basic, like elementry school: share.
lender.occupational_info: I am a restaurant manager in downtown Chicago. It is alot of fun, and I love what I do.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I have worked in East Africa for six years, and I like to think that I can give something back to people in that region.
lender.occupational_info: I am a paleontologist.

lender.name: Tim and Marci
lender.loan_because:
I (Marci) recently read Muhammad Yunus' book, "Banker to the Poor", and was amazed by the effectiveness of microlending at battling poverty. Its a simple model with outstanding results because of the spirit and work ethic of these borrowers. Their stories just inspired and challenged me.
Fortuitously, not long after that a friend told us about Kiva and my heart just started thumping when I saw the site! Now I can put a face with the stories Id been so stirred by.
It thrills Tim and I to know that we can participate in bringing real life change to these businessmen and women! It is our desire not only to lend to, but to pray for those we sponsor. God has blessed us abundantly and we want to honor Him by loving His people well. We cant wait to see them succeed and prosper!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the importance of self-employment as a means to better your future, your family's future and your country's future.
I am so blessed that I have a responsibility to share my good fortune with others. This is one small way to fulfill that responsibility.

lender.name: Joni
lender.loan_because: As a professional photographer I know how hard it is to get a business up and running, I want to help where the challenges businesswomen face are even greater than mine.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a small business that sells gas analyzers to measure air pollution from power plants, refineries and other plants, as well as selling research instruments for air pollution and medical research.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I have been heavily involved as an advocate for microcredit for the past 15 years through RESULTS CANADA and have seen how it can help people in industrial and third world countries escape poverty. Many people have brilliant ideas, but no access to collateral. Microcredit is a very valuable and accessible financing tool.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retiree from the Canadian government and spend my time doing community volunteer work with a few organizations. My interest in microcredit comes from being a partner with RESULTS CANADA. I am the president of a non-profit known as Canada Microcredit Educators Group which primarily promotes and develops microcredit.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: it feels like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I visit people in their homes that have been given 6 months or less to live. I help manage their medications, pain and other symptoms. I help their family care for them in their last days.

lender.name: Dorie and Terry
lender.loan_because: We want to assist needy individuals around the World who show the desire to provide for themselves and their families, and who demonstrate a spirit to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We own our own businesses.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: Hand up > Hand out!

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I have been helped, many times, along the path to forming a successful business and finding a rewarding career. I believe it is an honor to now be able to help others to do the same thing.
lender.occupational_info: Christina owns a company for which she travels all over the US doing medical research work. She also studies herbal medicine and makes medicines and products from plants. This part of her business is just starting to grow.

lender.name: Folorunso
lender.loan_because: I beleive in real business
lender.occupational_info: Successful

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I'm happy to contribute to helping some people to accomplish their - small but important - business dream

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to, and my sister is incredibly inspiring.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit to grow and do big things in life. I want to support those who are striving to independently provide for their families while making a dream come true.

lender.name: Judy
lender.occupation: Internal Staffing director at global company

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Others supported me. I want to put a different face on America and Americans.
lender.occupational_info: I figure out smarter way to sell more things to more people.

lender.name: Tim & Richelle
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed & feel a responsibility to help others.

lender.name: Maxine
lender.loan_because: I it's a great way to help people create a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Justin Enco
lender.loan_because: it is good to help each other
lender.occupational_info: Musician / Songwriter / Performer

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I believe that we in the first world have been given the opportunity to help those less fortunate, and that we must act.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: serves a useful purpose
lender.occupational_info: help people in their homes with skilled nursing, physical therapy, housekeeping and personal care.

lender.name: ALISHA
lender.loan_because: This is a picture of a hut where a family lives. I went to Uganda last year and saw the hardships of people living in developing countries. A small loan to a family can make great changes in their lives. I hope to be a life time member of KIVA
lender.occupational_info: I am a 8th. grade student trying to make a small difference. And I am a part-time small business lender

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lender.name: Jeannine
lender.loan_because: of a purely selfish reason, it feels terrific to give back and knowing that a little can actually make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global car manufacturer but my job is in the US promoting the US corporate messages to the media. But the real fun is getting to drive new cars :) !

lender.name: Marah
lender.loan_because: I like seeing tangible results for tangible goals. I can change a life with a lot less money than you'd think.
lender.occupational_info: I work with musicians from around the world to get their work publicized in newspapers and magazines. I help get people out to their concerts, and to know about their records.

lender.name: Paul Mehmi
lender.loan_because: To help others achieve their dreams and gain a better future.
lender.occupational_info: Help making a difference in the lives of others.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have an opportunity to better themselves and those whose lives have been touched by others should seek to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I seek to grow and protect my clients' wealth.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and would like to help others
lender.occupational_info: Help others with legal problems.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: It seems like an easy and painless way to make a positive impact on another person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I provide information to my co-workers to enable them to do their jobs better and to be more productive.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I am trying to be a better steward of the financial gifts God has given me.

lender.name: John and Heather
lender.loan_because: We hope to help others and it makes us all feel great.. Them and Us
lender.occupational_info: NGO - Raising money for needs across the world.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I think it is so wonderful just to help someone get a start. We have all needed help in our lives before and we should be grateful for it pass it along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wildlife photographer and wildlife conservation advocate. I am fortunate that my work brings me to Africa, India, and Asia and I hope to be able to have the chance to help in these places!

lender.name: Karola
lender.loan_because: I want to help when I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am teaching youngsters chemistry and physics in a vocational school in southern Finland.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like to think of myself as an international financier.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be poor and work hard to improve the lives of family members.
lender.occupational_info: I basically do what I can to keep my clients (who work in investor relations) happy by helping them with whatever they need; if I can not help directly, then I make sure I find someone who can.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way to reach across the world and help those who have great ideas to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make arrangements to transfer their assets and possessions to their loved ones upon their passing.

lender.name: Panos
lender.loan_because: I want to give an opportunity to people to have a proper life and live on their own.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I find the economics of microfinance fascinating. For a long time, I've believed that it would not be governments that lifted the world out of poverty, but rather that it would be other individuals.
lender.occupational_info: I help keep people and projects organized, focused and on-time.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: This world needs all the help it can get at this time.

lender.name: Monica, Louie and Avery
lender.loan_because: We know how difficult it is to run your own business and we want to support others on their road to success!
lender.occupational_info: Monica owns an event planning business. Louie is a TV/radio host and producer, owning his own entertainment company.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: It's my way of giving back. I like to support programs providing microfinancing loans and empowering our less fortunate brothers, help them fund their small businesses hoping that through our own collective efforts, it will bring food on the table, povide roof for a family, and most of all help send kids to school.
lender.occupational_info: I work for one of the biggest reinsurance company.

lender.name: Ajit
lender.loan_because: Have faith in the basic goodness in people.
lender.occupational_info: Solve complex problems using common sense.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Veronica, Chicago, IL
lender.loan_because: It is important and needed.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I believe these loans help people, which, in turn, helps the world.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: the world's a smaller place than we realize...
lender.occupational_info: I'm a MBA student in New York, studying Corporate Social Responsibility. --- Je suis tudiant de 2me cycle New York. Je fais mon tudes sur la rsponsabilit sociale des entreprises.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share with others. The people on Kiva just need an opportunity to gain their independence. I especially like to help those that are trying to educate their children.
lender.occupational_info: I worked to put my husband through Medical School back in the 1950's, and raised two daughters. I hope that someday every child in the world will grow up healthy, happy, loved, educated and in peace!

lender.name: gabby & dave
lender.loan_because: i can & because i should

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I understand the needs of humanity and the huge economic disparities among regions of the world. As a Christian, I am mandated to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I study my butt off!

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: helping people is fun!

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: Deserving people need a chance and I can help a little.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but live a very busy life. I have been privileged to have three very different careers. Now I have a number of interesting activities and I rest a lot in between.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: It makes my heart happy!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Flight Attendant and also a knitwear designer. My husband and I love to garden, and have lots of hummingbirds in our yard. (see picture)

lender.name: nicole
lender.loan_because: I like to support local businesses; all industries are being monopolized in a sense, and ma and pa stores are getting wiped out...in addition, i will always have a special place in my heart for latin america.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: Someon helped me once, out of the blue, when I needed it most.
lender.occupational_info: When a regular school teacher is sick, I am called to teach their classes for them.

lender.name: Jette
lender.loan_because: I can, and I know how hard running a small business is.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small business where we practice massage and other touch modalities.

lender.name: Della
lender.loan_because: I like to give back to the world which has been good to me.
lender.occupational_info: Being retired, I do volunteer work in my community, for example, tutoring reading for high-school dropouts, editing a fund-raising community cookbook, helping advance President Obama's agenda for progress.

lender.name: John and Pat
lender.occupation: retired nurse and semi truck driver

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone succeed.

lender.name: dawn
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a therapist for children in a special school.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to give to others that are less fortunate and hope that my donations make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Damon & Alicia
lender.loan_because: We feel very fortunate and want to do something to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I sell books and Alicia teaches children.

lender.name: Jack
lender.occupational_info: My organization provides comprehensive security programs to America's schools.

lender.name: More Life To All
lender.loan_because: Love is the cure to all the madness of our existence. By allowing Love to motivate our actions we apply to upmost power available to mankind to impact his/her environment. Love indeed conquers All.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: It will make a difference in the life of someone who needs a break and becuase it makes a difference in my life as well.

lender.name: heather
lender.loan_because: it feels good in your heart and you know your helping someone with there journey through life. believe and keep the peace! Jamie Smith (daughter) 10 years old wrote this.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur who specializes in the Roofing industry in Canada. Personal Values: The continued development of the most Amazing Life!

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others; I enjoy working in other countries as part of a mission to serve.
lender.occupational_info: Helping my business achieve success through growing talent and helping others discover their God-given talents.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I think eveyone deserves a chance to make it in the world. Sometime we need a little help to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a grocery store called TOP Foods. I merchandise and stock haba(shampoo,soap,toothpaste,etc.) and GM (school supplies,cookware,lightbulbs,etc)

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: this is a unique opportunity to directly help people in need help themselves, and become sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: I work only part-time as an attorney writing and reviewing agreements for a business. I work full-time as a mom!

lender.name: Stephanie and Greg
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference. We like the idea of giving loans (in lieu of charity), as a loan provides support, plus it promotes dignity and responsibility. May all your dreams come true!
lender.occupational_info:
Greg and I both work with computers. But I'm really a cat lover, and Greg really likes bicycles!
Our friend, Joel, http://www.kiva.org/lender/joel7539, is an inventor and entrepreneur, he is experimenting in the next global currency for rapid and sustainable economic development. Please visit his website and read his White Paper on Sustainable Prosperity at: www.dualcurrency.com/files/wpcomplete.pdf

lender.name: Conrad Logic
lender.loan_because: Brooklyn is exhausting.
lender.occupational_info: Making sweet music.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, and I will. I love people and I believe that every one deserves a chance!
lender.occupational_info: My job is to use what I've been blessed with to help people less fortunate help themselves.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: if one has the power to help... help, no matter how small a deed
lender.occupational_info: i am a high school senior and i am currently interested in international politics and the growth of developing nations

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I like to help people all over the world through Kiva.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I loan because I like the concept behind KIVA.org.

lender.name: Janette & Mal
lender.loan_because: I want to help the people of Mexico so that they can make a living in their own country and not have to split up their family by coming to the US to find work.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Just trying to help people that are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: My mom taught me to share
lender.occupational_info: I learn, I study, I reapeat

lender.name: Ruby
lender.loan_because: babies care about people and love them because they are there.
lender.occupational_info: I am a gift that continues to give. My life is precious and my work is never done.

lender.name: Jeff and JoAnn
lender.occupation: Process Control Engineer and Anaytical Technologis
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Jeff programs computers and JoAnn works in a chemical laboratory.

lender.name: NYC Triathlon 08 Team 1
lender.loan_because:
. The Team says:
We are supporting one of our friends as he raises funds to be used in Kiva, as part of his swim-bike-run in the 2008 New York City Triathlon.
The whole thing sounds kooky to us, but the gleam in the eye of our friend, when he speaks about Kiva, tells us that we should support his efforts. .
lender.occupational_info:
Michael says:
My training for, and participation in, the 2008 NYC Triathlon is a fun excuse to put more money into Kiva and expose my friends to how Kiva works.
All of my friends, who are doing this with me, are the offspring of humble men and women who immigrated (whether by force, necessity, or choice). All of our forebearers came from countries & cultures around the globe.
We are proud of the stuggles they overcame and grateful for the sacrifices they made, in the hopes that we would prosper and have a better life.
We recognize in the Kiva entrepreneurs that same honor and vision for their families.
Our participation in Kiva acknowledges the dreams and goals our ancestors had for us. We are saying, "We remember you. We respect the efforts of others like you." .

lender.name: Castle Cruz
lender.loan_because: I rock! LOL
lender.occupational_info: I am an up-and-coming singer-songwriter.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: it's the right think to do. We are a global village, and I just want to help my neighbors.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe in possibilities.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a laboratory that studies fruit flies.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to be helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, answering the phone, greeting people and doing paperwork.

lender.name: La Chica y su Guapo
lender.loan_because: I'm a damned caring great ape.
lender.occupational_info: I gild the lily.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: there were a few times in my life that people offered me exactly the help I needed. Now, I hope I can do the same.

lender.name: Allen Family
lender.loan_because: We're a blue collar family that knows. Nobody suffers like the poor people suffer!

lender.name: LaToya & Rodney
lender.loan_because: the Lord has blessed us with so much and it is an honor to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I speak with patients and doctors about their medication and healthcare needs.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in seeing others succeed. I've been blessed with what I have, and I want to share it with others.

lender.name: Brita
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people in other parts of world. I'm a busy professional and this is a great way to assist other hard workers with their careers.
lender.occupational_info: I recruit information technology professionals. I interview people and help them find better jobs.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: We all deserve to have someone believe in us. I have had people do that for me and it is my resposibility to pass that trust on to another.
lender.occupational_info: Myself and my partners buy lumber from sawmills in the United States and Canada and sell to contractors

lender.name: Thomas Foskaris
lender.loan_because: I love people and want to see them succeed!
lender.occupational_info:
By profession, I help people resolve their financial & credit concerns in a variety of ways. My companies actively pursue responsible Green policies and are responsible for retirement income planning, wealth management and estate planning strategies. "Comprehensive Wealth Management Strategies - One Investor at a Time" www.ThomasFoskaris.com
We help people who have had credit problems in the past or who have been the victims of identity theft to correct or restore their consumer credit profile through a comprehensive credit repair process. We also offer some of the most comprehensive Identity Theft protection programs available to day. "We Work for You & We Get Results!" www.AMERGIS.com
Many people now find themselves in a difficult financial predicament and are over extended on consumer credit. At New Horizons we provide an alternative to bankruptcy through negotiated debt settlement. This process generally results in a much lower repayment to the unsecured creditor, but still provides some form of repayment instead of a complete erasure of the debt through bankruptcy. Please visit us at www.NewHorizonsDSLV.com for more information.
Lastly, we help citizens and residents of the USA to clean up their background information for employment purposes. Sadly, there are over 88 Million criminal records on file today in the USA. If you find that you made a mistake in the past and are now being denied a good job or career advancement opportunities even though you have already "paid your debt to society", visit our site for an easy and confidential on-line interview to determine your eligibility for "Criminal Record Expungement". It's your life. If you want to improve your lot, take the free assessment and see for yourself what the possibilities are: https://AMERGIS.cmrrp.com
Our basic philosophy is that to maintain & nourish the soul, we can never forget that we are all inter-woven into the larger fabric of the human condition. That being what it is, it has a tendency to no-so-gently remind us that no matter who we are, or where we come from, we can all use a little help every now and again.
Kiva gives us an opportunity to help real families from around the world in an enthusiastic, straightforward, direct thought provoking and impactful way.
It makes us proud to see people doing positive things to improve their lives. And we feel, with all possible humility, a deep sense of care for those whom we have helped and a deep sense of awe that there is still so much more to do to help bring the benefits of greater self sufficiency and entrepreneurial wealth to so many needy families in so many parts of the world.
This is good work and we are proud to be a part of it.

lender.name: Jarod
lender.loan_because: "A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him." - David Brinkley
lender.occupational_info: I proudly work for the largest retailer in the world

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I have been in a position where I needed money and didn't always have someone that I could look to for help. I loan because it truly makes dreams come true and feels rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I am in retail sales for a major cell phone company.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I love people
lender.occupational_info: I am retired at 63 after working since I was 12 years old. I know how difficult it can be.

lender.name: Trent Family Trust
lender.loan_because: We want to share our many blessings.

lender.name: Margaret Ann
lender.loan_because: A small investment can help make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Maneesh
lender.loan_because: i love it!
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to high school students in the city of (West) Oakland

lender.name: Bob & Jamie
lender.loan_because: Jamie and I are blessed with so much that we want to find a way to share with others to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with large companies to obtain financing and complete business acquisitions.

lender.name: Matt & Janet
lender.loan_because:
This is a great idea. We are happy to loan some of the money that God has blessed us with, to someone who needs it.
Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you. - Luke 6:38 (NIV)
.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical professional who helps those with breathing problems. My wife is a medical professional who helps those who want to have a healthier life style. Specificially in the area of nutrition and food.

lender.name: Phil T.
lender.loan_because: Acts of kindness make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Songwriter of poignant tales with universal appeal. The songs are grounded in personal experiences growing up on the streets of Woodside, Queens, NY. Writing influences include Bob Dylan, Jackson Browne, James Taylor, The Beatles and Billy Joel. Live with my family in Bedford, NH.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to have an entrepreneurial dream and have that dream halted because of lack of money.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers in a multitude of languages. I specialize in developing e-commerce websites.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I have more than a lot of other human beings in the world and I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I hope to be able to study in the University for the rest of my life. I have four degrees and since retirement, I just take classes that I like. In 2004, after I retired, I received a degree in African American Studies. I love to learn, read, and travel.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I have been self employed for many years. Now I deal Cards part-time. I want people to try and develope their own business and experience all of lifes rewards.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:31-46

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.occupational_info: With three kids (8yrs, 5yrs &4 yrs)my days are unpredictable1 I never know what game they are going to dream up[ or what mess they NEED to make! They are busy, but so much fun!!

lender.name: Gianna
lender.loan_because: I am very grateful to be able to help someone realize and achieve their dreams. I am honored to help someone and feel that I receive much more from giving than the gift I give. Much Love and Peace to everyone!

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: It's a great concept. i believe nobody becomes successful without a little help. the opportunity to watch a person grow a business and improve their life and build the community is probably more rewarding to me than anyone i might send a loan to.
lender.occupational_info: i build shopping centers , warehouses and office buildings

lender.name: Jon, Amy & Abby
lender.loan_because: We Should

lender.name: Kenneth and Beth
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher/principal from the public school system in the USA (Arkansas) and my wife, Beth, teaches 4th grade.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Many people helped me during my lifetime. It's only fair that I return the help in thanks. Helping people I don't know makes me a better person.
lender.occupational_info: In computer service all my life, but love to remember where I came from.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful way to give people a hand up!
lender.occupational_info: I take children into my home and raise them when their parents can't.

lender.name: King Family
lender.loan_because: From everyone who has been given much, much will be required; and to whom they entrusted much, of him they will ask all the more. Luke 12:48

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to see people accomplish their goals in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am an herbalist who sees clients, grows her own medicinal herbs, and makes her own medicines.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: I was watching Greta Vansusteran talking with Bill Clinton tonight and I checked out the website they were speaking of....this seems like an amazing way to help people get on their feet in far away places and do something valuable...thank you Greta!
lender.occupational_info: I write songs, and music with my guitar...it's alot of fun, and very rewarding when a song comes together. I'm also married and take care of my husband since he works so hard and I have 2 english bulldogs that I treat like children since I don't have children of my own.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.occupational_info: I am a locomotive engineer for Union Pacific Railroad. I run trains.

lender.name: Mike & Krystle
lender.loan_because: We can. Why not help others when the opportunity presents itself? Thanks for the opportunity, Kiva!

lender.name: Bonjour! Vincent de Fond
lender.loan_because: Pay it Foward: Visit >> http://www.maryvilleacademy.org/
lender.occupational_info: HealthCare & Computer Le Geek C'est Chic. Visit >> My eDiva playground http://www.beachchamber.com/webcam.html

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: i was always taught to help people any way i can, and its always nice to help those who are already helping themselves.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This seems a good alternative to fractional reserve banking.
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain the computer systems at a major automotive company.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do....
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and work at a bank full-time. Im nothing special.

lender.name: Edna
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed in my own life and I want to share with others who are not as fortunate. The loans made to Kiva recipients may mean the difference in poverty or the ability to get to the road of prosperity.

lender.name: ernest
lender.loan_because: i was helped with a small loan a long time ago now maybe i can help someone else who needs help
lender.occupational_info: i tattoo people

lender.name: David & Corliss
lender.loan_because: We loan because we have always felt that God gives us our gifts to share and what better way than to help someone who is working to help themselves.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Helping people help themselves in this fashion allows folks to maintain their dignity.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I can and everyone can if they try

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: A small amount can make a big difference in someones life. Everyone needs a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and invest in various real estate ventures.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: This kind of opportunity makes you realise that you can make a real, tangible difference in someones life.

lender.name: Bob & Debbie
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care.
lender.occupational_info: We are in the business of Golf Courses. From golf instruction (lessons) to managing golf courses.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people that are trying to better their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I drive and maintain my equipment transporting goods all over the US

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: The return on this investment cannot be measured in dollars, but, it sure makes lots of sense.
lender.occupational_info: I have started many successful businesses on my own and with friends and family.

lender.name: joan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: simply.....because I care. When I was a student in X-ray School I was fortunate enough to have student loans and scholarships. This is one very small way that I can give back to someone else who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large hospital and Medical Clinic in San Francisco... My job is taking diagnostic x-rays, bone density scans, and mammography.

lender.name: Mike & Betty with Sage
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much and I want to share my prosperity with others in need.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Because I care!
lender.occupational_info: I collect and sell antique and vintage jewelry. I enjoy helping people look nice and I love smiles! T-bonz my boxer loves smiles, and jokes too!

lender.name: Lyon Family
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with help on many occassions and Kiva seems to be a great place to help others.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.name: T L
lender.loan_because: life is so short ... I applaud all of those that work hard to contribute to our world.
lender.occupational_info: I have been very blessed in life. If I can share that with others, I am even more blessed.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I care about people and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn about life skills. I teach lessons about how to handle finances, cash flow, also I teach about believing yourself and effecting change in your life and community. I also teach about health, nutritiioni, physical fitness, rehabilitation, athletic training, and I teach about history and economics. I volunteer information - ask and I can help.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the contributing to others reaching goals that would otherwise be unattainable. the Lord says "To whom much is given, much is required", therefore I believe in honoring the word of God.
lender.occupational_info: As a guidance counselor I serve the community by imparting problem solving skills to middle school students. Additionally, I encourage them to reach past pain and prosper in their natural gifts and talents.

lender.name: Kent
lender.occupational_info: Software developer

lender.name: Cedric and Anthony
lender.loan_because: I to have dreams of starting my own freight broker business..And these great people are an inspiration to me!!!!!

lender.name: Kim & Allen
lender.loan_because: Not everyone in this world has the basics of life. Maybe we can help one person acquire them.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: Even though the small amount I give can't help very much, combined with other loans, it can change the world. Small regions at a time...

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because:
of Jesus Christ.
Then the righteous will answer him, Lord, when did we see you hungry and feed you, or thirsty and give you something to drink? When did we see you a stranger and invite you in, or needing clothes and clothe you? When did we see you sick or in prison and go to visit you?
The King will reply, Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.
lender.occupational_info:
The Bible says:
"For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life."

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a way of giving folks with extremely limited resources the chance to make a sustainable living. Because they are responsible for repayment, we become partners in creating a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Blessed by God to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: I want to help and contribute something to the human race.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: i think that everyone and anyone in the world should be able to make there dreams come true. and i would like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a hair stylist. i like help people feel better about themselves be giving them a new look. i love to do hair extensions, so that i can make there hair longer, thicker, and differnt colors.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I like to help others.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: We all need to help one another!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies start new companies, now I want to help individuals start their own companies!

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: I believe we live in a world community. Since I have particular affinity for Latin America, I do what I can to help folks there.
lender.occupational_info: I fund mountain recreation experiences for underserved children in Colorado.

lender.name: Bildersons
lender.loan_because: Share the wealth!

lender.name: Blanche
lender.loan_because: I could have spent the money on an ugly dress.
lender.occupational_info: I move or try to.

lender.name: Tom Skinner
lender.loan_because: I care, and it's fun to see these businesses grow!

lender.name: Chastity
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed enough to be able to.

lender.name: Rudolf
lender.loan_because: I Have seen how enterprising these people can be with so little
lender.occupational_info: I produce printed literature and other printed sheets on paper used in offices

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I realize how hard these folks work after being to Many of these countries and see how lucky I am to be in the United States I So admire many people around the world that work so hard just to stay alive! and never complain!
lender.occupational_info: I have been in retail sales most of my life Love Travel and Photography is my passion! Check out my Travel Site And while there Check out My Cat Site Both Neat to see!

lender.name: Jung & Rayna
lender.loan_because: Poverty anywhere makes us poor and prosperity everywhere makes us prosperous
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bio-tech company and my wife owns a business.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I won a large amount of money in a lawsuit
lender.occupational_info: I write things that nobody wants to read

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: It is a way I can help people in other countries, and hopefully make a good impression of the United States
lender.occupational_info: I go to peoples homes, and places where they are sick or injured and provide care and/or transport to the hospital

lender.name: Mark & Mari
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Own a business that sells and repairs forklift trucks.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Small business growth is the basis for creating jobs in any country's economy.
lender.occupational_info: My business is marketing high quality custom printed tags and labels to other businesses.

lender.name: Mark and Michele
lender.loan_because: Bill Clinton asked me to.
